sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 26, 2026 –

The trail will be groomed today for classic and skate skiing. The connector trail from the ski center to Bucks Run is no longer available.  Please know that you will have to walk to the start of the trail.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skied Thursday evening.  With the slightly warmer weather, the snow was slightly soft, which was actually from the somewhat icy conditions we've had lately.  Skate deck was still very skiable.  The classic tracks had a few parts that were getting a little thin, but no bare spots yet.  Good skiing.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Wednesday.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Welcome to another beautiful day of skiing at Nub's Nob. The snow is groomed into the base and skiing and riding conditions are top shelf today. The lodge at Pintail is open with an espresso bar and great food options. The soup of the day is creamy lemon chicken and wild rice. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
